constraints.name: frequency_bound
constraints.description: 字符串中某个子串出现的次数至少为 m 次

constraints.name: subsequence_constraint
constraints.description: 找到最长的满足频率约束的子串
constraints.formal: max(len(sub)) such that count(s, sub) >= m

constraints.name: rightmost_occurrence
constraints.description: 在多个满足条件的子串中，选择最右出现位置的子串
constraints.formal: argmax(r) such that s[r:r+len(sub)] == sub and count(s, sub) >= m
